sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-scroll' import { useState } from 'react' const NavBar = () => { const [navBar, setNavBar] = useState(false) const [clickMenu, setClickMenu] = useState(true) const changeNavBarBackground = () => { if(window.scrollY >= 20) { setNavBar(true) } else { setNavBar(false) } } const handleMenuClick = () => { setClickMenu(!clickMenu) } window.addEventListener('scroll', changeNavBarBackground) return (
Portfolio

) } export default NavBar
